text: Peace is a never ending process... It cannot ignore our differences or overlook our common interests. It requires us to work and live together.
author: Oscar Arias Sanchez

text: I have had a very difficult time with stage fright it undermines your well-being and peace of mind, and it can also threaten your livelihood.
author: Renee Fleming

text: I just always have to cry out a breakup, and then I can make peace with it pretty quickly.
author: Brittany Murphy

text: Self-Realization Fellowship seemed like training. It was the training ground for finding a sense of peace in myself. Because that's my job. It's no one else's.
author: Mariel Hemingway

text: That is why if Lebanon concludes a peace agreement with Israel and brings that accord to the Parliament our deputies will reject it Hezbollah refuses any conciliation with Israel in principle.
author: Hassan Nasrallah
